WRITING.TITLE: Were Master Chief's "moon jumps" ever explained in lore?
WRITING.TEXT: At least in CE, Halo 2 and 3 Master Chief ascends and descends in a very delayed manner, as if the gravity affected him differently (Halo 4 is less exaggerated as also 5). May be a game design feature to accommodate for the gamepad. As noted in the title, resembles jumping on the surface of the moon a lot.

gt; It's reasonable to assume that Master Chief could jump extremely high- he is wearing powered armor. Sure, this was never unclear. One of the only real changes in OSDT was the jump height. gt;while fighting aliens in slightly lower gravity. Actually, do the enemies have the same velocity as Chief? I'm now starting to remember Brutes being thrown, but not killed by explosives having clear deceleration in their arc. Likely affects the units jumping off from the covenant dropships as well.

WRITING.TITLE: Can the SponsorBlock project be integrated (to skip ads embedded into the video stream)?
WRITING.TEXT: website: https://sponsor.ajay.app/ The proprietary Vanced added support around a week ago: https://www.reddit.com/r/Android/comments/if3e8r/sponsorblock_the_sponsor_intro_and_subscribe/ This feature would be extremely useful especially since Newpipe doesn't support any thumbnail preview window similar to the Youtube website, you must always skip ahead blindly. Misleading VPN ads ("makes you anonymous ") are particularly common on YT these days.
https://github.com/TeamNewPipe/NewPipe/pull/3205

gt; It's pacing is perfect, slow enough that your brain can process everything that is happening on screen but fast enough to never be dull at times like HCE or 3 can be Can you explain the difference further?

WRITING.TITLE: Does Halo 5 have an assist medal?

WRITING.TEXT: This is for warzone and not for competitive multiplayer, I assume.

WRITING.TITLE: Are the Xbox Game Pass deals renewable?
WRITING.TEXT: I've read that the PC Game Pass can be immediately renewed for the $1/month discount if you first allow the subscription to lapse. I tried the same with [Game Pass Ultimate](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/xbox-game-pass-ultimate/cfq7ttc0khs0?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab) after using the current 1 #8364; a month deal, but after login in the price changes to the EU region default (?) 12,99 #8364;. How often the deals can be used? I didn't find the "cooldown" period specified in their terms of service.

WRITING.TITLE: Does Aurora store fetch updates automatically for you?
WRITING.TEXT: I simply can't get the updater to run automatically (frequency set to daily). I've often left the app alone for several days and when launched manually (seems to always restart when left idle) updates may be found. I've installed Aurora from F-Droid and I'm currently running v3.2.9.

WRITING.TITLE: Could F-Droid start tagging apps with "archived" source repositories?
WRITING.TEXT: example: https://github.com/adolfintel/chromiumUpdater

WRITING.TITLE: Do all 'big team battle' playlists currently have mixed game modes (summer 2020 season)?
WRITING.TEXT: I searched for a BTB game and was placed into a capture-the-flag match -- I prefer only playing CTF when explicitly searching as the mode requires so much thought in order to be effective and likely can heavily benefit from communication and playing in a dedicated group. The maps are also best learned (first played) elsewhere. BTB fiesta also mixes styles if I recall correctly, and personally I don't get much long-term enjoyment out of random weapons.

WRITING.TITLE: Does any Halo game have a particularly balanced 'infection' mode?
WRITING.TEXT: In Halo 5 on the "swamp-like" interior map (I wasn't able find its name) there are at least two designated "shotgun-camping" spots, a shipyard container and a geometrically similar corner with a cage on its other side, from where you human players shoot out. In my last game the latter had six players, three standing on the shoulders back agains the wall. How the other Halo titles fare? Reach still had exploitable spots when the game launched in MCC and I don't know if 343 fixes legacy bugs some players may see as features.

gt; I'm confused. Unless I'm missing something, there are only two big team battle playlists, and you've confirmed that both have mixed game modes, so what's your question? I don't know how the modes typically change and where all are listed. Has Halo 5 had slayer-only BTB?
gt; I #8217;m not sure if this is an unpopular opinion or what, but I personally loved halo 4 infection. Did you notice clear exploits people frequently took advantage of on the maps?

gt; Maybe also make sure your Android didn't kill/close the app to running in background. Some devices Android happily do that it seems. I forgot this, 'battery optimization' is now disabled for the app and I'll see if this matters. I'm on LineageOS and not stock ROM.
The AOSP camera also now has a barcode scanner. I didn't immediately find Binary Eye as essential.

Some don't want to install proprietary apps on mobile. You're likely accustomed to installing a new app for every social media platform whereas websites don't run on the background and have such wide access to your device. The new Reddit loads for several seconds on my device when old and i.reddit.com are near-instantaneous.

WRITING.TITLE: How to catalogue a media collection?
WRITING.TEXT: I plan to catalogue each title (a PC or console game, DVD/BD, boxset etc.) in my personal collection by scanning the barcodes on my phone. For video games, Mobygames is the most comprehensive database, but I found no established data-import tool [by searching](https://github.com/search?q=mobygames amp;type=) and one promising necessitates requesting an API key. Discogs certainly has a suitable tool available, but I don't have much records. Would it be fine to to just scan and copy the EANs to a text file, waiting for to finish the project later? I may be able to use [the Worldcat database](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/WorldCat) for instance over scraping Amazon store pages or similar.

WRITING.TITLE: Does FirefoxCI always have the latest builds of the apps in each branch?
WRITING.TEXT: For example the beta browser is dated 12-08 and appears to be more than one version behind of the Google Play version. https://firefox-ci-tc.services.mozilla.com/api/index/v1/task/mobile.v2.fenix.fennec-beta.latest.armeabi-v7a/artifacts/public/build/armeabi-v7a/geckoBeta/target.apk I don't have Play services installed on my phone and would prefer automating updates with this app https://f-droid.org/packages/de.marmaro.krt.ffupdater

WRITING.TITLE: Does Halo 3 have 'unified medals' in MCC?
WRITING.TEXT: I have the unified medals enabled in the settings, but the tooltip states that the option only affects CE and Halo 2. I don't know if this is correct. Halo 3 seems the use [the original set of medals](https://www.halopedia.org/List_of_Halo_3_and_Halo_3:_ODST_Medals) which is somewhat undeveloped, in particular the assist medal provides important statistical information.

WRITING.TITLE: request: handle ".compact" parts in URLs (i.reddit.com)
WRITING.TEXT: https://www.reveddit.com/y/subject1465/.compact/ ...results in an error. Reddit adds the string `.compact` to the "compact" site's links, e.g. https://i.reddit.com/user/subject1465/submitted/.compact?sort=new `.compact` should be ignored.

WRITING.TITLE: An AOSP keyboard with the Ctrl key (to undo/redo)?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm not currently looking for any alternative keyboard, I'm used to AOSP. Hacker's Keyboard has the key, but its Android 4 UI isn't welcoming and my workflow appears to have taken a hit. The app may not be in active development anymore.

Note that AVGN has released a BD with all episodes 1-140: https://cinemassacre.com/2016/12/02/avgn-and-jmm-dvds-and-blu-rays-in-stock/ The early episodes aren't certainly in HD, but are hopefully from the source files at a higher bitrate.
gt; I hate the look of the unified medals I don't consider this comment as constructive since there is an option to disable them. Currently in Halo 3 I don't know if I've earned an assist.
gt; AnySoftKeyboard I can't find the "core" app on F-Droid, only language packs and other addons

WRITING.TITLE: Why MCC is relatively expensive (at least as a physical copy)?
WRITING.TEXT: It seems that Microsoft wants to maintain their MSRP ($30 or $40), going by the amazon.com and local listings. Halo 5 I recently bought for under 10 #8364;, but MCC is strictly 30 #8364;. While this would otherwise to be a decent deal, I already own the game on PC and want the physical Xbox version for collecting-purposes and to only play against controller users (input-based matchmaking isn't yet live). Also ODST and Reach have to be purchased separately (the standard competitive multiplayer may be included).
gt; If it's "otherwise a decent deal" then just buy it. I also have to pay for 7 #8364;/month for Gold which I don't otherwise need much at all.
Sure, but I have the entire set on PC (not all have yet been released). I had expected a 2014 game which has been in Game Pass since the beginning to have dropped more in price by now.

gt; It's pacing is perfect, slow enough that your brain can process everything that is happening on screen but fast enough to never be dull at times like HCE or 3 can be Can you explain the difference further?

WRITING.TITLE: Why Halo: The Master Chief Collection (Xbox One) is relatively expensive?
WRITING.TEXT: * released in 2014 and has been on the Xbox Game Pass subscription service since its launch in mid-2017 * Halo 5 (2015, currently Xbox One -only) is much more low-priced and appears to frequently go below 10 #8364; as new * [pricecharting.com](https://www.pricecharting.com/search-products?type=prices amp;q=halo%3A+the+master+chief+collection) estimates second-hand copies (CIB) to be valued slightly above 20$ * has a PC port (ODST and Halo 4 haven't yet been released)

WRITING.TITLE: Did Rock of Ages 3 receive a wide physical launch?
WRITING.TEXT: I have issues with finding the boxed Xbox One version and I wonder if the game was released in Europe on all platforms. [The publisher website](https://modusgames.com/rock-of-ages-3/) redirects to the frontpage when I select a country and the platform. To make my search easier, can you report the EAN (barcode) number?

WRITING.TITLE: Spyro Reignited Trilogy: 'Tint Remover' mod
Is there a comprehensive list of media domains?
WRITING.TEXT: I realized that I essentially never view any video (or play audio) in browser, Youtube I watch via Newpipe (on mobile) or mpv (youtube-dl the latter relies on supports thousands of websites). Firefox's "stop autoplay" feature doesn't prevent buffering and I frequently see data being download in streaming video players so many sites use on seemingly any page. Youtube is easily taken care of by blocking `googlevideo.com` and `youtube.com` (outside of this domain, if you don't use https://github.com/iv-org/invidious) to kill the embeds. `spotify.com` also appears to be used often and you can't play anything without an account and DRM enabled. [Jwplayer has their own support page](https://support.jwplayer.com/faqs/which-ip-addresses-or-domains-can-i-add-to-an-allow-list). Blocking all major media domains would be extremely useful on mobile where battery life and data usage are a concern. Sadly blocking third-party content causes too much of a breakage to be truly viable in my opinion, especially due to CDNs.

WRITING.TITLE: Primary invidious (lightweight YouTube front-end, aglp3) developer steps down from project and shuts down main instance

WRITING.TEXT: gt; ASIN : B07WQ5DTKY Thank you. Google seems to return only amazon.com

WRITING.TITLE: Is Game Pass (both on PC and Xbox One) planned for Rock of Ages 3?
WRITING.TEXT: I don't consider Rock of Ages 3 as good of a deal as its predecessor was, sadly, and the game launched at twice the price (30 #8364; over 15 #8364;). I'm waiting for the physical copy to drop in value and would much appreciate inclusion in Game Pass which would also increase the playerbase, especially if cross-play is supported.

WRITING.TITLE: recommended dark blue theme for Gnome?
WRITING.TEXT: Nothing such appears to be preinstalled in Gnome and running `dnf search gtk | grep theme` only gives three themes with 'blue' in their name, all predominantly white.
gt; I use Ultimate-Dark-Flat-Blue. I put it in ~/.themes. https://www.gnome-look.org/p/1246387/ I only see dark/grey -- can you show a screenshot with blue colorscheme enabled?

gt;Hey all, further to yesterday's post re someone had possible DRM issue in firefox. I go the following error message from youtube-dl [imgur screenshot]. Please paste your errors in plaintext in the future.
/u/Aozolai To confirm, have you played the competitive multiplayer to a great degree? This medal is indeed used in warzone but apparently never in the slayer games (confirmed yesterday).
gt; Adwaita dark grey
gt; But adapta Sure, but has the development stopped? https://github.com/adapta-project/adapta-gtk-theme

WRITING.TITLE: Is Firefox Relay still problematic?
Potential controller mapping bug
WRITING.TEXT: Since I created an alternative gamepad layout for MCC in the Xbox 'accessories' app Halo 5 appears to occasionally "activate" it. May sometimes carry to the next match. This may be an Xbox OS-level bug as well - I don't play other games currently and can't say. Please tell me anything you may know since every affected ranked game puts me at a heavy disadvantage.
If you don't know how to remap on Xbox One, see https://www.howtogeek.com/254132/how-to-remap-your-xbox-one-controllers-buttons/

WRITING.TITLE: Which video format has a higher compatibility?
WRITING.TEXT: I frequently encounter Youtube videos which don't play, but this may be limited to resolutions 720p and below. Should I generally use MPEG-4 or WebM (I doubt the last format 3GP is viable since it isn't natively supported by Youtube)? With audio-only playback I can't recall ever having issues and the delay is nonexistent as well.

and to add, I don't think that changing formats is possible without entering Newpipe settings. I use 1080p by default but of course a lot of content, even some new has been uploaded at a lower resolution.

gt; You may have simply left it on. It won't turn itself off. No, I didn't as the issue comes and goes. I'm aware that I have to disable the layout unless I want to use it in every game (and personally haven't launched. MCC in a week). There is no shortcut to swap the 'slots' I may have accidentally hit? Changing is only possible from the said accessories app, right?

WRITING.TITLE: How to enable fzf shell extensions?
WRITING.TEXT: I installed from the Fedora repo and as far as I can see no of the [three hotkeys listed](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf#key-bindings-for-command-line) have any effect. https://github.com/junegunn/fzf#using-linux-package-managers gt;Shell extensions (key bindings and fuzzy auto-completion) and Vim/Neovim plugin may or may not be enabled by default depending on the package manager. Refer to the package documentation for more information.

WRITING.TITLE: How much time it generally takes to downsample video?
WRITING.TEXT: Specifically, I'm planning downsampling 4K video to 1080p from a video subscription site (downloads with no DRM) because my current low-end hardware drops over 50% of the frames. Sadly I remember in the past FFmpeg giving extremely long (~24 hours) estimates for feature-length videos. I don't plan to transcode -- only downsample the resolution.
